A shock treatment alone won't do it, of course. There needs to be a magical aspect. And, of course, that means more gory work on your part.

Bring me the brains of {@LinkCreature:9#800#gula butchers} to absorb the nightmare that clouds his mind.

And how come my cures never require something innocuous like a "warm glass of milk" or "plenty of rest?"
They're smaller than I thought. But I guess that explains a lot, eh?

Bring me brains, . Brains!

What? Is that not okay to say?
